modal.connected_hint: You can now manage packages and organisations from the web UI.

page.no_packages_hint: This organisation may not exist or has no public packages.
page.not_found_message: The organisation "{'@'}{name}" does not exist on npm

orgs_page.connect_required: Connect the local CLI to view your organisations.
orgs_page.own_orgs_only: You can only view your own organisations.

modal.scope_warning_text: Unscoped package names are a shared resource. Only claim a name if you intend to publish and maintain a package. For personal or organisational projects, use a scoped name like {'@'}{username}/{name}.

what_we_are.admin_description: We also aim to provide a better {adminUi} for managing your packages, teams, and organisations â€” all from the browser, powered by your local npm CLI.
